channel.title: Another battlefield 2 error :(
channel.description:
Can someone help me please. Ingame I can start out everything fine and lovely. I can play in any server without problems - except internet connections. I play for about 15 - 20 minutes then I usually get a 5 second black screen and it turns off without error. But this this I got this error:
I am also using a cracked version ^^
[IMG]http://i225.photobucket.com/albums/dd7/magenticnoob/error.jpg[/img]
And ideas?? my specs
Operating System : Windows Vista Home Premuim (6.0, Build 6000) Processor: Intel(R) Core(TM)2 Quad CPU Q6600 @ 2.40GHz (4CPUs), Memory: 3070MB RAM DirectX Version: DirectX 10
Chip Type: GeForce 8500 GT

item.title: Another battlefield 2 error :(
item.dc:creator: @The_Solid The Solid
item.description:
@The_Solid wrote:

Going to try this. If it works I am going to kiss you ^^

Read full topic

item.title: Another battlefield 2 error :(
item.dc:creator: @Exception Exception
item.description:
@Exception wrote:

sigh
Visual Studio -> Tools -> Options -> Debugging -> Just-In-Time -> Uncheck everything.
Basically, Visual Studio is being a cunt and trying to debug compiled code every time it throws an unhandled exception.

Read full topic
